slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag cung zad bde bar yang brgyus/ cung zad sdug bsngal bar yang brgyus so/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ ji

ltar bde bar brgyus/ ji ltar sdug bsngal bar brgyus/ des smras pa/ sems can gyi bya ba byas pa/ gang yin pa de dag ni bde bar brgyus pa yin no/ /rgyal po gtsug pud can dang / grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis bdag sas mnan pa gang

yin pa dang / blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang / bhe ru ka gnyis tshegs chen pos bros pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal bar brgyus pa yin no/ /dge slong don nyung ngu dag gis smad de smras pa/ de ni pha gsod pa yin te/ des tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na dgra bcom pa

nyid thob pa nyes pa med pa gnod pa mi byed pa bsad de/ 'di ni de'i me tog tsam yin gyi 'bras bu ni gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang

ldan pa u tra ya nas las ci bgyis na des phyug pa nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i khyim tu skyes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis nas mtshon

gyis bkum par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong u tra ya na nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas

shing bsags pas u tra ya na nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi

'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar

yang ni/ /chud mi za ba 'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/

bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo / /ji tsam du ri brags shig na rngon pa zhig 'dug ste/ ri brags de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na ri dgas dang bya mang po dag

gi rten du gyur pa mtshe'u zhig yod pa der rngon pa de nyi ma re re zhing ri dgas dang bya mang po dag drungs dbyung ba'i phyir dang / nyams par bya ba'i phyir dang / tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir rngon spyad dang / snyi dang rnyong mang po dag 'dzugs par byed

do/ /de'i rngon spyad dang / snyi dang rnyong de dag kyang don yod pa yin no/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ri brags der phyin nas lha'i gnas shig tu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas de snga dro sham thabs bgos

lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ri brags der bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /der bsod snyoms brgyus nas bsams pa/ lha'i gnas 'di nyin mo rgyun lugs mod pa yin gyis/ ri brags kyi phyi rol gyi gnas zhi ba zhig tu bsod

snyoms bza'o snyam nas de ri brags nas byung ste/ 'di ni zhi ba'o/ /'di ni zhi ba'o/ /zhes mtshe'u de ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas lhung bzed dang chu tshags mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/ rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas lag pa gnyis bsnyal

te chu btsags nas/ lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ lag pa gnyis bsnyal nas kha bkrus te lhung bzed dang / chu tshags gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas/ rkang pa gnyis bkrus te

shing drung zhig tu brten nas brang 'gro'i rgyal po nyal ba'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil dkrung bcas te spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa dang / de'i nyin mo mi'i dris ri dgas gcig kyang ma zin to/ /de na rngon pa de nang par sngar langs te mtshe'u de ga la ba der song nas/

des rngon spyad dang / snyi dang rnyong de dag byul bar brtsams pa dang / ri dgas gcig kyang ma mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi rngon spyad dang / snyi dang rnyong 'di dag don yod pa yin na/ gang gi phyir der ri dgas gcig kyang ma zin pa

'di'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas/ des mtshe'u de'i then kor byul bar brtsams pa dang mi'i rjes mthong nas/ de rjes de'i phyi bzhin du song ba dang / rang sangs rgyas spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa de mthong nas des bsams pa/ rab tu byung ba sems

zhi ba 'di dag gnas 'di lta bu dag tu mngon par dga' bar byed pas gal te bdag gis 'di'i srog gcad pa ma byas na 'di dag gis nges par bdag gi 'tsho ba gcod par byed kyis rnam pa thams cad du 'di gsad par bya'o snyam nas/

snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pha rol btang ba des mda' dug can gyis gzhu rnga'i dbyibs 'dra ba rna drung du thug par bkang ste rang sangs rgyas de'i gnad du bsnun to/ /rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsams

pa/ rngon pa nyon mongs pa 'di ha cang smas pa dang / nyams par gyur na mi rung gis/ 'di la lag nas drang ba sbyin no snyam nas des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba

dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/ /so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas rngon pa de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas

de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du sgyel nas smras pa/ yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol/ mar gshegs su gsol/ nyon mongs 'dam du bying ba bdag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol/ rang sangs rgyas de rngon pa de la rjes

su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi mkha' las shod du babs so/ /de nas rngon pa des zug rngu med par byas te/ rma lhan gyis klan nas smras pa/ 'phags pa sdum par gshegs su gsol/ gal te 'dir gser gyi lhan pas klan par mdzad na de yang bdag

gis sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyis bsams pa/ bdag gis rnag gi lus 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa thob zin pas de'i phyir da ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ de

rngon pa de nyid kyi mdun du yang nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag rnam par bstan nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so/ /rngon pa de nor dang ldan pa yin pas

des spos kyi shing thams cad kyis phung por bcer te bsregs nas phung po de 'o mas zhi bar byas te rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan

dang / ba dan dag bsgreng zhing dri dang / phreng ba rgyu dang / bdug spos dang / phye ma dang / sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byas nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces/ bdag yon gnas dam par gyur pa 'di lta bu la

gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang 'thun par mi 'gyur bar mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug pa nor mang ba/ longs spyod che bar skye zhing 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed

cing thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig ces btab bo/ /dge slong dag de la de'i tshe de'i dus na rngon pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong u tra ya na yin te/ des rang sangs rgyas kyi gnad du mda' dug

can gyis bsnun pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gdungs nas las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mtshe'u de nyid du ri dgas su gyur nas mda' dug can gyis

gnad du bsnun cing dus la bab ste/ da ltar gyi bar du yang dgra bcom pa thob kyang de mtshon gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni da ltar phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che bar skyes shing nga'i bstan

pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas shing / 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las

gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/ las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na

las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyal po gtsug pud can dang / grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / tshe dang ldan pa kā tyā ya na chen pos las ci bgyis na des dog sas non par gyur/ blon po'i mchog he ru ka

dang / bhe ru ka gnyis kyis las ci zhig bgyis na bros par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi

za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas de dag nyid kyis las byas shing / bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par

smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la

rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ chud mi za ba 'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags shig na khyim bdag zhig 'dug pa

des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu khye'u zhig byung ngo / /yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/

dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu mo zhig byung nas/ de gnyis bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to/ /bu mo de dang na mnyam pa'i bu mo dag slong ba 'ongs na/ bu mo de la slong ba 'ga' yang ma 'ongs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung

ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse bas/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo / /ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig

ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ri brags der phyin nas bu mo des khyim phyag nas phyag dar rib ma'i steng nas bor ba de rang sangs rgyas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba de'i mgo la phog go/ /bu mo des der phog pa mthong nas 'gyod pa'i sems kyang ma skyes

la/ stes dbang gis de nyid kyi nyin mo de slong ba 'ongs nas ming pos de la dris pa/ deng khyod kyis ci byas na des na khyod slong ba 'ongs/ des smras pa/ bdag gis deng rab tu byung ba'i steng du phyag dar bor ro/ /des 'dzum phyung ba dang / bu mo

des bu mo gzhan dag la sbran cing des kyang gzhan dag la sbran nas/ 'jig rten la bu mo gang dang gang slong ba mi 'ong ba des rang sangs rgyas kyi steng du phyag dar bor na de la slong ba 'ong ngo / /zhes sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de lta

bu byung ngo / /bdag nyid chen po rnams ni bsnyen bkur ma yin pas 'jigs pas rang sangs rgyas de ri brags de nas song ba dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi sting du dor bar brtsams nas de dag kyang dong ba dang / pha

ma dag gi steng du bor bar brtsams so/ /ri brags de na khyim bdag dge ba'i chos can gnyis shig 'khod pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag dam pa ma yin pa'i chos 'phel ba 'di bzlog par bya'o/ /zhes de gnyis kyis bzlog cing

spangs so/ /dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyi steng du phyag dar bor ba de ni rgyal po gtsug pud can 'di yin no/ /ri brags de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs gang yin pa de ni grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs

'di dag yin te/ 'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas dang / drang srong dang / pha ma dag gi steng du phyag dar bor ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sas non par gyur to/ /khyim bdag gnyis kyis bzlog pa gang yin pa de ni blon po'i mchog he ru

ka dang / bhe ru ka gnyis yin te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas bros par gyur to/ /bu mo'i ming po gang gis 'dzum phyung ba de ni dge slong kā tyā ya na chen po yin te/ des 'dzum phyung ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sas g.yogs te/

gal te dge slong kā tyā ya na chen pos yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs par ma gyur du zin na/ dge slong kā tyā ya na chen po yang sas non cing tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag

pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/ las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na

las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun

dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /kau shambī na khyim bdag nor bzangs shes bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug pa de'i khyim rgyal po shar pa'i drung na 'dug cing de nang par sngar langs te las kyi mtha' dag la rtog tu 'gro'o/ /de dbyig

gi gdangs can yin pas rgyal po shar pas sgra'i gdangs las de la gser bzhag pa 'bum yod par shes so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po shar pa don gyi gnas na 'dug pas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyim bdag nor bzangs nyi ma re re

zhing nang par sngar langs te rang nyid las kyi mtha' dag la rtog tu 'gro ste/ 'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum yod ces grag na ci'i phyir bdag nyid ngal bar byed/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum ga la mchis te/ gal te 'di la gser bzhag

pa 'bum mchis na ci'i slad du bdag nyid ngal bar bgyid/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te khyed cag yid mi ches na khyim bdag nor bzangs bos shig dang dri'o/ /de dag gis khyim bdag nor bzangs bos nas rgyal pos dris pa/ khyim bdag khyod la gser bzhag pa

'bum yod dam/ lha mchis te/ gal te bzhed na bzhes su gsol/ khyim bdag nga ni gser don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ 'di ltar ngas khyod la ci yod dam med ces dri bar zad do/ /lha mchis te lhas ji ltar mkhyen pa de zhu'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod

dbyig gi gdangs can yin pas ngas sgra'i gdangs shes so/ /khyim bdag nor bzangs rgyal pos gdangs las shes pas de'i ming khyim bdag gdangs can khyim bdag gdangs can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal pos de la smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod phyug por gyur pa yin na ci'i phyir

khyod rang gis zhal ta byas te las kyi mtha' dag byed du 'jug /des smras pa/ lha gal te bdag gis rang gi zhal ta bgyis te las kyi mtha' bgyid du ma stsal na/ bdag gi longs spyod dag 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par yang mi 'gyur la/ lhas kyang

bdag dbyig gi gdangs can lags par mkhyen par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod ci'i phyir glang po che dang rta dag gis mi 'gro/ lha bdag khyim khol lags pas glang po che dang rta dag gis mchi ba bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma lags

so/ /rgyal pos bsams pa/ grogs 'di lta bus rgyal srid byed du gzhug par nus kyis/ 'di blon po kho nar gzhug go snyam du rig nas smras pa/ khyim bdag blon po gyis shig dang / lhan cig tu rgyal srid byed du gzhug go/ /des smras

pa/ lha de skad bka' stsal pa mi rigs te/ bdag ni khyim khol lags pas bdag zhing las kyi mtha' rjes su bsgrub par rigs kyi/ blon por mi rigs so/ /rgyal pos de lta de ltar nan gyis mnan na ci nas kyang gdon mi za bar khas len par shes

te/ mnan nas des kyang khas blangs so/ /de nas rgyal pos de blon por bcug nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis chos dang / rigs pas rgyal po'i bya ba dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag bya bar brtsams nas/ des blon po gzhan thams cad zil

gyis mnan pa dang / de dag phrag dog skyes te yid mi bde bar gyur nas 'dus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di ltar khyim bdag gdangs can gyis zil gyis mnan par gyur na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de na kha cig gis

smras pa/ 'di la ci'i phyir bsgrub tu med/ 'di ji srid du gtan du gting tshugs par ma gyur pa de srid du 'di la rgyal pos chad pas gcod du bzhug par bya'o/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ ma nyes kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de dag thams cad 'dus te rgyal

po'i gan du dong nas smras pa/ lha rgyal po su lags/ des smras pa/ khyed cag ga las the tshom za/ rgyal po nga yin mod gzhan su zhig yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha gdangs can rgyal po lags kyi khyod ni ma lags te/ gal te de 'tshal bar gyur na

lha bkrongs te rang nyid cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci'i phyir de de ltar 'gyur te/ de ni chos gtso bor byed pa yin pas ji ltar de ltar byed par

'gyur/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis lha'i mngon sum du 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag gdangs can rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba'i rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba dag gis yongs su bskor cing rgyal

po'i pho brang du zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du thams cad skye bo'i tshogs kyis gang bar des rgyal po'i bya ba dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ba dang / rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba snga na 'khod pa dag kyang de dang

lhan cig phyir byung ste rgyal po'i tshogs med par 'dug pa dang / blon po de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gzigs sam/ bdag cag gis gsol pa gang lags pa de ni 'di lags te/ gal te 'di 'tshal bar gyur na lha bkrongs te rang nyid

cod pan bcings nas rgyas srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos bsams pa/ re shig 'di brtag par bya'o snyam nas/ des de rgyu ba dang gnas pa las brtag par brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na byang lam nas ded

dpon gyis zong rta ded de kau shambīr phyin nas rgyal pos gdangs can la bsgo ba/ gser 'bum gyis rta dag nyos shig /des gser 'bum gyis rta dag nyos pa dang / rgyal pos gdangs can la bsgo ba/ 'bum gyi phyed byin la 'di skad ces bdag gis

'bum tshang bar byin zin to/ /zhes byos shig /des smras pa/ lha de mi rigs te/ gal te de ltar bgyis na slan cad 'dir chibs rta 'tshong ba dang / gzhan 'ga' yang mchi bar mi 'gyur gyis 'di ltar lha'i dkor las 'bum phyed stsol

cig dang bdag gis 'bum phyed stsal to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag nga'i tshig de bzhin smras na 'di ci 'gal/ des smras pa/ lha bdag gis tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi don du tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par rngo mi thog

go/ /rgyal pos de la lan gsum gyi bar du smras na yang de ma btub nas/ de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i bka' lan gsum gyi bar du bcag

pa de'i chad pa ci yin/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha de'i chad pa ni dgum pa lags so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na ngas khyim bdag gdangs can yongs su btang ngo / /blon po rnams kyis mi gshed
ma pa dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag lhas bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gdangs can sod cig ces byung ngo / /rgyal pos mi gshed ma pa de dag la gsang ste bsgo ba/ khyed kyis khyim bdag gdangs can gsad

par mi bya bar 'di ltar bsdigs par bya'o/ /de dag gis de'i mgrin par ka ra bi ra'i phreng ba btags te grong khyer gyi dbus nas gsod sar khrid pa dang / de'i nye du dag dong ste smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di la lhas bka' ci stsal pa de ltar gyis

la bdag nyid gsod du ma gzhug shig /des smras pa/ kho bos lha'i bka' chos dang ldan pa bcag gam/ ci gal te lhas kho bos nyes pa med pa gnod pa mi byed pa gsod na gsod du zad/ kho bos tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi

phyir tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par mi nus so/ /mi gshed ma pa de dag gis de gsod sar khrid de smras pa/ khyim bdag lhas bka' ci stsal pa de ltar gyis la bdag nyid gsod du ma gzhug shig /des smras pa/ kho bos

lha'i bka' chos dang ldan pa bcag gam ci/ gal te lhas kho bo nyes pa med pa/ gnod pa mi byed pa gsod na gsod du zad/ kho bos tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi phyir tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par mi nus so/ /mi gshed

ma pa de dag gis de rgyal po'i gan du khrid de smras pa/ lha khyim bdag gdangs can 'di 'di skad mchi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag nga khyod gsod par 'dod pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar brtag par 'dod do/ /des smras pa/ lhas

bdag brtag pa'i dgongs pas gnas skabs 'di lta bu stsal na/ gal te bkyon na ji ltar bgyis par 'gyur/ 'di ltar gal te lha bdag la dgyes na bdag sbyin pa dag stsol cing / bsod nams dag bgyid par ci gnang / rgyal pos smras

pa/ khyim bdag gal te de lta na gnang gis ci dgar sbyin pa dag byin cig /bsod nams dag gyis shig /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste/ sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa mi bsko nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te

'dir sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang / cha lugs can gyi dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ gzhan dag 'ongs par gyur na kho bo la sbron cig /ji tsam na lho lam nas drang srong lnga brgya tsam yul dbus su 'phags pa de dag mthar gyis lam du 'dong ba na dgon pa'i lam

du phyin nas de dag dgon pa'i nang du son pa na chu zad nas de dag chu dang bral bas skom gyis gdungs nas dgon pa'i lam der phan tshun byul bar brtsams pa dang / de phan tshun nyul ba de dag gis ha cang thag mi ring ba na gsing ma sngon po'i phyogs na shing ljon

pa zhig mthong nas de na kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag gsing ma sngon po'i phyogs 'di na shing ljon pa zhig snang gis tshur sheg dang / 'di na chu yod par 'gyur gyis ltar 'dong ngo / /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ legs kyis de bzhin bya'o

zhes de dag dong ba dang ci tsam na chu med par mthong nas de dag gis gsol ba gdab par brtsams te/ shes ldan dag sa phyogs dang shing ljon pa 'di lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri za 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye

chen po gang gnas pa des bdag cag drang srong lnga brgya skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la chu byin cig ces smras so/ /ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las lag pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhig gser gyi ril ba bhring gar thogs te byung nas drang srong rnams kyis

snyim pa bzed de chu btung bar brtsams nas/ ji tsam na myangs na chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yin te/ bsil ba dang / mngar ba dang / yang ba dang / 'jam pa dang / gsal ba dang / dri nga ba med pa dang / 'thung na mgul la mi gnod pa dang / 'thungs pa na lto

mi na ba yin te/ de dag tshim par gyur nas ril ba bkang ste shis pa brjod nas 'phags te dong ba dang / de dag la blo skyes pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gis de lta bu'i ya mtshan mthong nas de la khyod su yin/ las gang gis 'dir skyes shes ma dris

pa ni bdag cag nyams pa yin gyis/ tshur sheg phyir log la dri'o snyam nas de dag thams cad 'dus te phyir log nas shing ljon pa de'i drung du 'khod de smras pa/ shing ljon pa de la lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri za 'am mi 'am

ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa gang gis bdag cag dgon pa'i lam du song ba/ gnod pa dang nyam nga ba mi bde bar gyur cing 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas tshim par byas pa des bdag

gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smros shig /ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/ shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' ba yin pas kho bo su yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa yid ches

par mi 'gyur bas ji ltar smra bar bya/ drang srong rnams kyis smras pa/ kye bdag cag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong na ji ltar yid ches par mi 'gyur/ the tshom ma za bar smros shig /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na nyon cig dang / kho bo

gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smra bar bya'o/ /yul ko sa la dag na grong khyer mnyan yod ces bya ba de na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i khyim drung na kho bo bzang mkhan byed cing 'dug 'dug ste/ de mgon med pa

rnams la zas sbyin par byed pas yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i slongs mo ba dag lhags shing lhags shing kho bo la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim gang yin zhes dris nas/ kho bos lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ de dag la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim

'di yin no zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis de nas lag pa gang ba dang / snod gang ba dang / 'byor pa thob pa dang / rnyed pa thob cing 'dong ba de dag kho bos mthong ngo / /mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba skyed par byed de/ kho bo las des rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams

kyi nang du skyes shing / shing ljon pa 'di la gnas te/ de'i phyir kho bo'i lag pa g.yas pa shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur to/ /de dag gis shis pa brjod pas bstod de dong ngo / /ji tsam na phyogs gzhan zhig tu phyin nas bza' ba dang btung ba zad

de/ de dag bkres pas gdungs shing skom pas gdungs nas kun du brtag par brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na ha cang thag mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa chen po lo ma sngo zhing snum pa zhig snang nas de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag shing ljon pa chen po lo ma

sngo zhing snum pa 'di lta bu snang ste/ sngar yang bdag cag gis shing ljon pa 'di lta bu kho nas chu grub kyis 'dir 'dong dang gal te na chung zad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de dag der dong ste gsol ba gdab par brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag sa phyogs dang shing

ljon pa 'di la lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri za 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa de bdag cag drang srong lnga brgya bkres pas gdungs pa dang skom pas gdungs pa rnams la zas dang skom byin cig

ces smras so/ /ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/ shes ldan dag deng shig dang 'di nas ha cang mi ring ba na rdzing bu zhig yod pa de'i 'gram na shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de'i drung na 'bras chan gyis bre bo gang zhing 'dug pa de las zos shing 'thungs

nas bza' ba dang btung ba ci 'dod pa khyer cig /de dag dong ba dang / ji tsam na rdzing bu bya ngang pa dang / ka raṇ ḍa ka dang / ngur pas mdzes par byas pa zhig 'dug pa de'i 'gram na shing ljon pa zhig 'dug pa de'i drung na 'bras can tshod ma sna tshogs dang bcas pas gang ba zhig

'dug pa mthong nas/ de dag gis der khrus byas te zos shing chu mthungs nas ril ba chus bkang ste/ bza' ba dang btung ba ci 'dod pa khyer nas shis pa brjod de dong ba dang / de dag la blo skyes pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gis de lta bu'i ya mtshan mthong nas de

la khyod su yin/ las gang gis 'dir skyes shes ma dris pa ni bdag cag nyams pa yin gyis tshur sheg phyir log la dri'o/ /snyam nas de dag thams cad 'dus te phyir log nas shing ljon pa de'i drung du 'khod de smras pa/ shing ljon pa 'di la lha 'am/

klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri za 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa gang gis bdag cag dgon pa'i lam du song ba gnod pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / mi bde bar gyur cing 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur pa

rnams la chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / zas kyis tshim par byas pa des bdag gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smros shig /ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/ shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid

ches par dka' ba yin pas kho bo su yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa yid ches par mi 'gyur bas ji ltar smra bar bya/ drang srong rnams kyis smras pa/ kye bdag cag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong na ji ltar yid ches par mi 'gyur/ the

tshom ma za bar smros shig /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na nyon cig dang kho bo gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smra bar bya'o/ /yul ko sa la dag na grong khyer mnyan yod ces bya ba de na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba

zhig 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed nas ri brags shig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa longs spyod srabs nas des bsam pa/ mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed kyis de'i

gan du song na de las cung zad 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam nas de de'i gan du song ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol bar 'dod nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags pa na/ des de mthong

nas smras pa/ khyim bdag bdag la zas kyi mgron gyis shig /des de la smras pa/ bram ze tshur shog /rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong la der zo shig /de de dang lhan cig 'phags pa dang / ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lam kar

zho'i bum pa zhig rnyed nas des de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/ bram ze'i zho'i bum pa 'di dge 'dun la brims shig /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bsod pas tshim par byas pa

dang / bram ze des kyang zho'i bum pa de dge 'dun la brims so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas khyim pa dag zan sbyin par brtsams te/ des khyim pa gzhan dag

la ni zas bsod pa byin/ bram ze de la ni ngan pa byin pa dang / des de la smras pa/ khyim bdag rab tu byung ba rnams ni bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa yin pas re shig 'di dag la ni bsod pa sbyin par rigs na/ bdag cag khyim pa bslab pa yang dag par ma blangs par

'dra na ci'i phyir khyim pa gzhan dag la ni zas bsod pa sbyin la bdag la ni zas ngan pa sbyin/ des de la smras pa/ bram ze khyim pa 'di dag kyang bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa yin te/ 'di dag gis kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs so/ /

des de la smras pa/ khyim bdag gal te bdag gis kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong len na bdag la yang zas bsod pa sbyin nam/ des de la smras pa sbyin no/ /des yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa dang / de nas khyim bdag

mgon med zas sbyin gyis de zas bsod pas tshim par byas nas des zos te 'phags pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ bram ze yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang skom 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /des skom 'thungs te song ba dang /

nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab nas mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba na ri brag shig yod pa der bram ze'i khyim zhig tu gnas pa dang / bram ze des de la smras pa/ bram ze zan zo shig /des smras pa/ kho bos zan mi za'o/ /des smras pa/

ci'i phyir/ des smras pa/ kho bo dge sbyong gau ta ma la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs so/ /des de la smras pa/ bram ze gal te re shig za na de lta na legs/ gal te mi za na kho bo'i khyim du gnas par mi bya'o/ /

des dus ma yin par zos nas gso sbyong ral lo/ /ri brags na gnas pa'i bram ze gang yin pa gang gis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs nas dral ba de ni kho bo yin te/ kho bos yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso

sbyong blangs te/ thams cad ma dral na kho bo sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ kho bos yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs nas dus ma yin par zos te/ gso sbyong dral bas kho bo

rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ shing ljon pa 'di la gnas shing / de'i phyir kho bo la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba gso sbyong ral zhes bya bar shes so// //

'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po bdun bcu rtsa gsum pa/ drang srong de dag mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag drang srong rnams kyis dus 'di srid du brtul zhugs la gnas pas kyang 'di'i 'bras bu cir 'gyur mi

shes na/ lha'i bu gso sbyong ral 'dis bram zer gyur pa na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs shing / de dral na yang 'di rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes kyis/ bdag cag kyang gang du 'dis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong

blangs pa der 'dong ngo / /de ltar bya'o zhes de dag gis gros byas te/ mnyan yod du 'phags nas ji tsam na mthar gyis kau shambīr phyin pa dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyi sbyin pa'i zhal ta byed pa'i mi rnams kyis de dag mthong nas/ de dag gis khyim bdag

gdangs can la sbran pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag cag la bsgo ba/ sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang cha lugs can dag mthong na kho bo la sbron cig ces byung ba de dag lhags te sgo na sdod do/ /des smras pa/ 'jug tu chug shig /de dag gis 'jug tu

bcug pa dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyis de dag mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag gang nas 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag lho lam nas so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed kyis lho lam du ngo mtshar ba mthong ba dang thos

pa ci yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag re shig bdag cag gis sngar mthong ba dang thos pa'i ngo mtshar gzhan dag lta zhog gi/ te por mthong ba dang thos pa'i ngo mtshar gang yin pa dag smra bar byas nyon cig /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag smros shig

dang kho bo ngo mtshar de dag nyan to/ /de dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par brjod pa dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyis thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te de dag zan byin nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang du 'deng / de dag gis smras pa/

khyim bdag mnyan yod du 'dong ngo / /shes ldan dag de na ci yod/ khyim bdag de na lha'i bu gso sbyong ral gyis gang la brten te/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa'i khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yod do/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag

gal te de lta na de kho bo'i yang ma mthong ba'i grogs yin gyis 'di nyid du dbyar gyi mtshan mo gyis la dbyar 'das nas kho bo dang lhan cig 'dong ngo / /de dag de nyid du dbyar gyi mtshan mo gnas te/ dbyar 'das nas mnyan yod du 'phags pa dang khyim bdag gdangs can gyis

bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa la smras pa/ lha bdag mnyan yod du bgyi ba cung zhig mchis na/ gal te lhas gnang na der mchi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gal te de lta na song la khyod kyis don bsgrub pa byas nas myur du phyir shog shig /de rgyal pos gnang nas drang

srong lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig 'phags te mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas skyed mos tshal na sdod cing 'dug go/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis khyim bdag gdangs can 'dir 'ongs te/ skyed mos tshal na sdod cing 'dug go zhes thos so/ /thos

nas kyang des bsams pa/ bdag gis khyim bdag gdangs can ma tshor ba kho nar gnas su 'jug tu gzhug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis/ bkur sti chen pos 'jug tu gzhug go snyam nas des de bkur sti chen pos 'jug tu bcug ste lam

gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas zan byin no/ /de nas drang srong de dag lhags nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun du spyad de smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag ga las 'ongs/ 'dir ci la 'ongs/ de dag gis

smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis lha'i bu gso sbyong ral la gang byin pa de bdag cag la yang byin cig des smras pa/ shes ldan dag mi dran no/ /khyim bdag bdag cag gis khyod la dran par bya'o/ /shes ldan dag legs so/ /de dag gis dran par byas

nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci kho bo las len nam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'das las len/ khyim bdag khyod kyis su las blangs/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das las so/ /khyim bdag gal te de lta na bdag cag kyang de kho na las len to/ /

shes ldan dag legs kyis de ltar gyis shig ces des de dag khrid de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na chos ston cing bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin thag ring po kho na nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong ngo / /dge

slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di skyes dang bcas pas 'ong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni 'di ltar gdul ba'i skyes lta bu gzhan med do/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin drang srong lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan

'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa drang srong lnga brgya po 'di dag bcom ldan

'das las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong len par 'tshal na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag ci nas kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi ba dang / dge bsnyen nyid du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan

du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta

bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i

chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob cing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces pas rab tu phyung zhing dge slong dag

tshur shog /tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i 'jug kho nar skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / lag pa lhung bzed dang / bya ma bum

gyis 'brel ba dang / dge slong rdzogs par bsnyen nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /yang smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas

gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gdams ngag byin nas de dag gis spro ba dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas shing

dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang /

mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i brnyed pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur

to/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag gdangs can la chos

dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus sngar mdzad pa'i chos dang ldan

pa'i bka' mchid gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i bka' mchid dang / tshul khrims kyi bka' mchid dang / mtho ris kyi bka' mchid dang / 'dod pa rnams kyi ro myang ba'i nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par

'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i phan yon dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos dag rgya cher ston par mdzad do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de sems rangs pa dang / sems nyams bde ba dang / sems dga' ba dang / sems

la sgrib pa med pa dang / yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa kun shes pa'i skal ba dang ldan zhing mthu yod par gzigs pa de'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden

pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dag rgya cher ston par mdzad do/ /'di lta ste dper na gos dag pa nag nog med pa kha bsgyur du rung ba/ tshon du bcug na tshon legs par 'jen par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyim bdag gdangs can

gyis kyang stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs par gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang /

chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang gzhan gyis mi bkri zhing chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba

der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge

'dun la skyabs su mchi yis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan cad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas mngon par dad pas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag

khyod ming ci/ btsun pa bdag nor bzangs shes bgyi ba las rgyal po shar pas bdag gdangs las 'tshal bas de'i slad du bdag skye bo dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kau shambīr gshegs par gsol/

bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur 'tshal lo/ /khyim bdag kau shambī na gtsug lag khang yod

dam/ btsun pa ma mchis so/ /khyim bdag dge slong dag ni gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der bgrod pa dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas par sems so/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol dang / bdag gis ji ltar kau shambī na gtsug lag khang mchis par 'gyur

ba dang / dge slong rnams kyang bgrod pa dang / mchi ba dang / gnas par sems par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang

mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas/ de la mnyan yod na bya ba 'am/ byed pa ci yod pa thams cad byas shing bsgrubs nas yang bcom ldan

'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la grogs dge slong 'ga' zhig stsol cig dang bdag gis de dang lhan

cig bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / kau shambī na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag dge slong gang gi gdul ba yin snyam du dgongs na

dge slong skul byed chen po'i gdul ba yin par gzigs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po la bka' stsal pa/ skul byed khyim bdag gdangs can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / kau shambī na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs

la soms shig /tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos bcom ldan 'das las cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te/

mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar longs spyad pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste/ lhung bzed dang /

chos gos thogs nas khyim bdag gdangs can dang 'grogs te/ kau shambī ga la ba de logs su song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na kau shambīr phyin to/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can kau shambīr ma zhugs pa kho nar kun dga' ra ba nas

kun dga'i ra bar skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du/ tshal nas tshal du dang gol bar song ste/ gang du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug pa'i sa phyogs kau shambī nas ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye ba nyin

mo rgyun lugs nyung zhing blag cor chung ba/ mtshan mo sgra chung zhing 'ur sgra chung ba/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung ba de lta bu ci yod ces btsal na/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyis rang gi kun dga'

ra ba kau shambī nas ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye ba nyin mo rgyun lugs nyung zhing blag cor chung ba/ mtshan mo sgra chung zhing 'ur sgra chung ba/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang

'di snyam du sems te/ sa phyogs 'di bzang gis 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug go snyam mo/ /de na khyim bdag gdangs can dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos/ skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das

kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/ skar khung dang / skar khung zlum po dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa rtsig tu bcug go/ /de nas gtsug lag khang byas shing zin nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen

po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bcom ldan 'das shul du gshegs pa'i gshegs rgongs kyi tshad ci tsam/ khyim bdag 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'dra'o/ /'phags pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i ji tsam/

khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lam du 'gro ba'i rgongs mal ni rgyang grags bcu'o/ /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis rgyang grags bcu bcur gshegs rgongs sa dag shom du bcug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya btang ste/

bcom ldan 'das kau shambīr gshegs su gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag gis

bsnyen bkur bgyi'o zhes gsol to/ /pho nyas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag bcom ldan

'das bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal

zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag

long shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/ grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/ thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/

dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po

che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su
bskor ba/ bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sa mkhan

ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/

'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/

'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ thags bzangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs

kyis yongs su bskor ba/ brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams kyis shin du dul ba/ spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/

chu gter ltar ting nge ba/ sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom

gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun du bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po

dang ldan pa kun shes kauṇḍi nya dang / rlangs pa dang / ming cen dang / ma 'gags pa dang / shā ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung dang / kun dga' bo dang / nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po dag dang / gzhan yang dge slong gi dge

'dun mang pos bskor te/ kau shambī ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na kau shambīr byon to/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi

dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul nas/ 'di ltar gnas brtan dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kau shambī na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes mdo sde'i mtha' nye bar sbyar to/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge

'dun dang bcas pa la gtsug lag khang phul nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te rang gi khyim du song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag

'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas

pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/

rgyas pa che ba gdags su rung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ skul byed rung ste/ skul byed bdun po 'di dag ni gang dag dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba

las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba dag yin te/ bdun gang

zhe na/ skul byed 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i ra ba 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas

pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/

snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba dang po yin no/ /skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu 'jug pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs

kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya

ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gnyis pa yin no/ /skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/ khri dang / khri'u dang /

stan nang tshangs can dang / la ba dang / sngas dang / gor bu dag 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag du rgyun mi

'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gsum pa yin no/ /

skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas gtsug lag khang de nyid du gtan gyi rkyen ris rjes su 'thun pa'i mchod sbyin 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi

bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams

bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba/ bzhi pa yin no/ /skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas glo bur du 'ongs pa dang 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa sbyin par

byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang /

bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba lnga pa yin no/ /skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang

ldan pas nad pa dang nad g.yog la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon

par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba drug pa yin no/ /skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan

pas rlung langs pa 'am/ yul ngan byung ba 'am/ char pa bab pa 'am/ lhags pa byung ba gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i rlung langs pa 'am/ yul ngan byung ba 'am/ char bab pa 'am/ lhags pa byung ba'i tshe dge 'dun la 'bras chan dag gam/ skyo ma dag gam/

thug pa'i btung ba dag bskyal te/ 'dis 'phags pa 'di dag lus mi rlan pa dang / chos gos mi gsher ba dang / longs spyad na bde ba la reg par 'gyur ro snyam pas 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs

kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu

che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba bdun pa yin no/ /skul byed rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/

bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /skul byed 'di lta ste dper na gang du chu

klung chen po lnga po 'di lta ste/ gang gā dang / ya mu na dang / sa ra yu dang / gnas can dang / ma hi zhes bya ba tha mi dad par 'bab par 'gyur ba de la ni chu 'am/ chu'i bum pa 'am/ chu'i bum pa brgya phrag gam/ chu'i bum pa stong phrag gam/ chu'i bum pa 'bum

phrag 'di snyed yod do zhes chu'i tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /skul byed de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi

'bras bu 'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'di tsam mo zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa

dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi

'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma lags pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gdags su rung

ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skul byed rung ste/ skul byed bdun po 'di dag ni gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba'

zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba dag yin te bdun gang zhe na/ skul byed 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin

gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos grong tshigs ga ge mo zhig na nye bar brten cing bzhugs pa thos shing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na

rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i

bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba dang po yin no/ /skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid du

tshur gshegs par rtsol bar thos shing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal

ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/

rgyas pa che ba gnyis pa yin no/ /skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid shul du zhugs pa thos shing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba

rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba'

shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gsum pa yin no/ /

skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid grong tshigs de nyid du byon par thos shing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po de dge ba nges par 'byung ba

dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang /

bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba bzhi pa yin no/ /skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas

de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro zhing mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs

kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod

nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba lnga pa yin no/ /skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos

de nyid kyi drung nas chos tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston pa

nyan cing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/

mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che

ba drug pa yin no/ /skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid kyi drung nas chos thos nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro

zhing bslab pa'i gzhi dag len par byed pa 'di ni skul byed rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang /

bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba bdun pa yin no/ /skul byed rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi

bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni 'di tsam mo zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te 'di

ltar bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /skul byed 'di lta ste dper na gang du chu klung chen po lnga po 'di lta ste gang gā dang / ya mu na dang / sa ra yu dang / gnas can dang / ma hi zhes

bya ba tha mi dad par 'bab par 'gyur ba de la ni chu 'am/ chu'i bum pa 'am/ chu'i bum pa brgya phrag gam/ chu'i bum pa stong phrag gam/ chu'i bum pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes chu'i tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar

chu mang ba'i phyir chu'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /skul byed de bzhin du rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/

bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'di tsam mo zhes tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mi dang ri dgas tshogs kyis bsten pa yi/ /chu klung tha dad 'bab par gyur pa dag /mtsho mchog bkra shis

gtsang ma ngogs bde ba/ /rin chen 'byung gnas rgya mtshor 'bab pa ltar/ /de bzhin bsod nams rgyun kyang rnam kun tu/ /sbyin bdag gos sbyin zas skom sbyin pa dang / /mal cha stan dang gding sbyin mi la 'bab/ /chu klung chu 'bab rgya mtshor ji bzhin no/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can ni dad pa dang ldan la de'i 'khor ni ma dad nas des bsams pa/ bdag

gi 'khor 'di ma dad na bdag gi gtsug lag khang du ji ltar spyod pa je brtag go snyam nas de cha lugs mi mngon par byas te sham thabs dma' bar bgos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas

gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang / rgan zhugs shig sgo khang na 'dug nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog par bgyid pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di
su'i lags/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyi'o/ /'phags pa ci 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam/ 'on te phongs pa lags/ bzhin bzangs gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu/ phongs pa ni ji lta bu/ 'phags pa

gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni gtsug lag khang lags la/ gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni phongs pa lags so/ /bzhin bzangs 'di phongs pa yin no/ /ji ltar gyur/ khyim bdag de ni dad pa dang ldan pa yin na de'i 'khor ma dad pas mkho ba

mi stobs so/ /'di ltar khyim bdag de la bu mo mngag gzhug ma mgu byed ces bya ba dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig yod na/ 'on kyang de'i khyim de na dbang med de/ gal te de la dbang yod par gyur na de dge slong rnams la

mkho ba stobs par byed pas 'di gtsug lag khang du 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bsams pa/ da ltar bdag gson pa nyid na yang bdag gi gtsug lag khang na dge slong rnams kyi gnas skabs 'di 'dra na bdag shi na ci 'dra bar

'gyur snyam du rig nas dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi khyim du song nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ khyed cag las gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul shing long

shig /de'i tshe na mgu byed bum pa thogs te chu bcu ba'i phyir phyir byung ba dang / des der ras ma zhig rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang de la phan gdags pa'i slad du phyogs der gshegs pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das la brtag par

brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis na bza' chos gos kyi grwa rdol bar de la bstan pa dang / des bsams pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi ras ma 'di bzhes su gnang na bdag gis 'di bcom ldan 'das la
dbul lo snyam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/ mgu byed gal te khyod kyis yongs su btang na phul cig /des bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pa byas nas

gus pa bskyed de phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de de nyid kyi mdun du na bza' chos gos kyi grwa klan te btsems pa dang / kha dog mthun par gyur to/ /de dad pa skyes pas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bran mor ma gyur cig /dbul bar ma gyur cig ces smras nas bum pa chus bkang ste khyim du song ngo / /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis nang mi la tshul shing brims pa dang / mgu byed kyis smras pa/

khyim bdag 'di ci lags/ gdangs can gyis smras pa/ mgu byed khyed cag las gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul shing long shig dang kho bo la longs spyod rgya

chen po dag yod do/ /des myur ba myur bar chu'i bum pa bzhag ste tshul shing blangs nas smras pa/ bdag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid par spro ste/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos

kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi yis khyod thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig ces des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te gus par bsnyen

bkur bya bar brtsams so/ /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis yang cha lugs mi mngon par byas te sham thabs dma' bar bgos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal

nas gtsug lag khang du 'dug par brtsams pa dang / yang rgan zhugs gzhan zhig sgo khang na 'dug nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog par bgyid pa
mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di su'i lags/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyi'o/ /'phags pa ci gtsug lag khang lags sam/ 'on te phongs pa lags/ bzhin bzangs/

gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu/ phongs pa ni ji lta bu 'phags pa gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni gtsug lag khang lags la/ gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni phongs pa lags so/ /bzhin bzangs 'di sngon ni phongs

par gyur pa las da ni gtsug lag khang du gyur to/ /ji ltar gyur/ bzhin bzangs khyim bdag gdangs can la bu mo mngag gzhug ma mgu byed ces bya ba/ dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig yod pa

de khyim bdag des 'dir las su bskos te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs shig ces bsgo nas/ da ltar de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis

bsnyen bkur byed pas des na 'di gtsug lag khang yin te phongs pa ma yin no/ /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis thos nas dga' ste khyim du song nas des bu mo mgu byed kyi lag tu lde mig dang / lde mig kyog po gtad nas nang

mi rnams la smras pa/ khyed cag mgu byed kyis ci byin pa des gnas par gyis shig /kau shambī na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyang bsdus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bos bu mo mgu byed 'di bran mo las phyung ste khyim

gyi bdag mor bcug go zhes bsgrags so/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa khyim bdag gdangs can rgyal po shar pas gdangs las 'tshal ba la

gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar du ma zad de 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang khyim bdag gdangs can 'di rgyal po shar pas gdangs las shes par gyur te de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer

bā rā ṇa sī na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / phyi dgra dang / nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/ chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad dang bral ba/

sā lu dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyis rgyal srid byed du bcug go/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ltas pa dag gis lo

bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis rang gi yul du dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste phyogs su bsgo ba/ nga'i yul na gnas pa dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag nyon cig /ltas pa dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char

mi 'bab par lung bstan gyis de'i phyir khyed cag las gang dag la lo bcu gnyis kyi zan bdog pa de dag gis ni 'khod par bya'o/ /gang dag la mi bdog pa de dag gis ni gzhan du 'dong bar bya zhing lo bcu gnyis 'das nas phyir 'ong bar bya'o/ /de'i

tshe na bā rā ṇa sī na khyim bdag gzungs byed ces bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba zhig 'dug pa des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod

dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo mchis so/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa

dag 'jig rten du byung ngo / /ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na bā rā ṇa sīr phyin nas de dag khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong ste phyin nas smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyis su

mkho ba stobs par nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag je mdzod pa la smras te slad kyis gsol lo zhes des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po 'di dag gi lo bcu gnyis

kyi zan yod dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo mchis so/ /khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag mchis kyis bzhugs shig dang gsol lo/ /de dag der 'khod do/ /ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas

gzhan lnga brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na bā rā ṇa sīr phyin nas de dag kyang khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong ste phyin nas smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyis su mkho ba stobs par nus sam/

des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed la gsol lags na/ ci'i slad du yang sgrub par mdzad/ khyim bdag de dag kyang gzhan la kho bo cag kyang gzhan no/ /'phags pa dag je mdzod pa la smras te slad kyis gsol lo zhes des mdzod pa

bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rab tu byung ba stong gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo mchis so/ /khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/ 'phags

pa dag mchis kyis bzhugs shig dang gsol lo/ /de dag kyang der 'khod do/ /khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste/ sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa'i mi dag dang spyan 'dren bskos nas/ spyan 'dren des nyi ma re re zhing song ste gdugs tshod la 'bod par byed do/ /

spyan 'dren des khyi zhig gsos pa de nyi ma re re zhing spyan 'dren de dang lhan cig 'gro bar byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na spyan 'dren de la brel ba zhig byung nas/ des je 'di bsgrubs te phyis spyan drang bar bya'o snyam nas de gzhan du song ba dang / khyi

des de ma rnyed nas sngon goms pas rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gan du song ba dang / der yang de ma mthong nas des skad phyung ngo / /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag spyan 'dren dus

las yol nas khyi 'dis spyan drangs kyis tshur spyon bzhud do/ /de ltar bgyi'o zhes de dag 'phags pa dang / spyan 'dren 'ongs te khyi des de mthong nas skad dbyung bar brtsams pa dang / spyan 'dren gyis bsams pa/ 'dis 'di dag spyan drangs pas

des na bdag nyid chen po 'di dag byon gor ma chag snyam du rig nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed sus spyan drangs/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyi 'dis so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ma nongs kyis slad kyis kyang gang gi tshe

bdag la brel ba 'ga' zhig byung ba de'i tshe na 'di nyid khyed spyan 'dren par 'gyur gyis khyed cag gshegs su gsol/ dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gzungs byed gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na mdzod pa gang

yin pa de ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na spyan 'dren gang yin pa de ni bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na khyi gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag gdangs can yin te/ khyim bdag gdangs can

'di de'i tshe yang rgyal po shar pas gdangs las shes par gyur la/ de ltar yang 'di des gdangs las shes so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du mi stong thub gcig 'ongs nas rgyal pos de la smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje khyod

su yin/ des smras pa/ lha bdag stong thub lags so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag stong thub la 'tsho ba byin cig /de dag gis de la 'tsho ba byin no/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs

can snying po lha brgyad khri dang ma ga dha pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bzhag pa de'i tshe na des rgyal po'i khab tu dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste bsgo ba/ rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang / pho brang 'khor

gyi mi dang / yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon cig /nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun po mi bya'o/ /nga'i yul du gang rkun po byed pa de ngas yul med par bya zhing brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni nga rang gi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes

bsgo'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdos btul ba de'i tshe na des kyang mnyan yod du dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste bsgo ba/ nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun po mi bya'o/ /nga'i yul

du gang rkun po byed pa de ngas gsad par bya zhing brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni nga rang gi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes bsgo'o/ /bar du yul ma ga dha na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang / yul ko sa la na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag

yin pa de dag mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod cing yul ma ga dha nas don 'thun pa gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed/ yul ko sa la nas don 'thun pa gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed nas thams cad du yul ma ga dha

na 'khod pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang / yul ko sa la na 'khod pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa de dag mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod cing don 'thun 'joms par byed pas don 'thun 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rgyun chad de/ rgyal po'i dpya dang lo thang mi 'du'o

zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sgra grags par gyur to/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de thos nas ru gcig btang na de bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs so/ /de bzhin du ru gnyis pa dang / ru gsum pa btang na de yang bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs

so/ /ji tsam na yul ma ga dha nas don 'thun yul ko sa lar 'phags pa de chom rkun pas 'jigs pas rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te bsel ba tshol bar byed nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha stong thub 'di lha'i 'tsho bas 'tsho

na ci'i slad du don 'thun gyi bsel mi bgyid/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de 'gro la rag gis thong shig /blon po rnams kyis de bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje khyod rgyal po'i 'tsho bas 'tsho la ci'i phyir rgyal po'i bka' bzhin mi byed/ des smras pa/ khyed

kyis bsgo ba gang zhig kho bos ma byas na de skad du spyo bar byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ don 'thun 'di yul ko sa lar 'gros 'di'i bsel gyis shig /des smras pa/ ma nyes kyis de ltar bya'o zhes des mda' lnga brgya pa'i dong pa gnyis thogs

te shing rtar zhugs nas don 'thun gyi mdun du 'phags so/ /chom rkun pa rnams kyis de don 'thun gyi mdun nas 'ong ba thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas/ de la pho nya btang ste bsgo ba/ chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon na re shing rta phyir zlog shig /

gnod pa thob par gyur ta re zhes zer ro/ /des smras pa/ dpa' bo la dpa' bo'i yongs su spang ba byin cig /chom rkun pa'i pho nyas smras pa/ ci khyod gcig pu dpa' bo yin nam/ kho bo cag kyang dpa' bo yin gyis phyir log shig /de

nas phan tshun mda' khar dgye bar brtsams nas des chom rkun pa'i pho nya'i gnad du bsnun nas de phyir log go/ /de bzhin du chom rkun pa gnyis dang / bzhi dang / brgyad dang / bcu drug dang / sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / drug bcu rtsa

bzhi nas chom rkun pa lnga brgya'i bar dag lhags nas des de dag gi gnad du bsnun nas de dag phyir log go/ /de bzhin du chom rkun pa gzhan lnga brgya lhags nas des de dag la smras pa/ ngas khyed kyi chom rkun pa lnga brgya bsad

na khyed cag kyang srog gis 'gebs par mi 'dod dam/ phyir log shig /chom rkun pa rnams kyis smras pa/ nged kyi gcig kyang ma sod na ci'i phyir nged phyir ldog khyod kyang rung nged kyang rung ngo / /des smras pa/ gal te khyed cag

yid mi ches na gang dag ngas bsnun pa de dag gi go phud cig /de dag gis go 'bud par brtsams pa dang / gang gis ji ltar go phud pa de de ltar dus la bab nas chom rkun pa de dag mi 'di ni gnod sbyin zhig go zhes byer te dong ngo / /stong thub mtshams kyi

bar na 'dug cing de don 'thun yul ko sa la nas 'ong ba gang yin pa de'i bsel yang byed/ yul ma ga dha nas 'ong ba gang yin pa de'i bsel yang byed do/ /des bsams pa/ bdag gis ci'i phyir phar 'gro tshur 'gro bya 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o

snyam nas des der khyim brtsigs te 'dug nas don 'thun gnyi ga'i bsti gnas su 'ang gyur/ de 'brog na gnas pa yin pas 'brog gnas 'brog gnas shes bya ba'i ming du gyur to// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam
po bdun bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ 'brog gnas su don 'thun dag lhags nas kha cig gis ni 'bras btsong bar brtsams so/ /kha cig gis ni phye btsong bar brtsams/ kha cig gis ni be reg /kha cig gis ni khur ba/ kha

cig gis ni ril bu btsong bar brtsams so/ /chang 'tshong dag gis kyang chang btsong bar brtsams te/ de nyid du 'khod nas der tshong 'dus chags par gyur to/ /'brog gnas kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phrin yig lha bdag

gis 'dir tshong 'dus btsugs kyis lhas 'dir zhal ta pa btang ba'i rigs so zhes spring ngo / /rgyal pos bsams pa/ gang du bdag gi ru gsum bcom zhing rab tu bcom zhing 'ongs pa der des tshong 'dus btsugs pas de ni de nyid

kyir gyur cig snyam nas des de la phrin yig ngas tshong 'dus de khyod la byin gyis der dpya dang lo thang ci 'du ba de dag khyod nyid ci dgar spyod cig ces spring ngo / /'brog gnas su tshong 'dus btsugs nas 'brog gnas 'brog gnas shes

bya ba'i ming du gyur to/ /'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gang cung zad bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa de thams cad 'brog gnas kyi mthu yin pas bdag cag gis 'di la

phan pa cung zad bya gor ma chag go snyam mo/ /de na kha cig gis smras pa/ ma nyes kyis de bzhin bya'o/ /ci zhig bya/ de na kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cag las gang su yang rung ba bag ma gtong ba 'am/ bag ma len pa des de 'khor dang bcas pa zan sbyin

zhing gos phrugs re yang bskon par bya'o/ /ma nyes kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de dag las gang bag ma gtong ba 'am/ bag ma len pa des 'brog gnas 'khor dang bcas pa zan sbyin zhing gos phrugs re skon par byed do/ /ji tsam na mi dbul po zhig bag ma len

du nye nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag la 'brog gnas 'khor dang bcas pa zan sbyin zhing gos phrugs re bskon pa'i 'byor pa ga la yod kyis/ 'di ltar bdag gis bag ma de blangs nas dang po kho nar 'brog gnas la dga' mgur spyod du phul la/ des

dga' mgur spyad nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis spyad par bya'o snyam du rig nas/ de 'brog gnas kyi gan du song ste mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ grong dpon bdag bag ma len du nye na bdag la khyod 'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsol zhing

na bza' phrugs re gsol ba'i 'byor pa ma mchis kyis/ 'di ltar bdag gis bag ma de blangs nas dang po kho nar khyod la dga' mgur spyod du 'bul gyis/ khyod kyis dga' mgur spyad nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis spyad par bgyi'o/ /'brog
